Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

Firstly, really sorry if this has been mentioned before, the search function still appears to be down.

Secondly, I was just landing on the Mun, and I was thinking how handy it would be if there was some sort of replay function!

While performing manoeuvres such as landings or docking, it\'s often too hard to appreciate the visuals because of focussing on instruments, keeping everything in the right place etc.

I think it would be awesome if there was a replay function so we could marvel in our achievements!

What do you guys think?

Yep, I agree.

I also would like to have whatever the opposite of time compression is. Â½ warp, if you will.
I also agree. There have been so many times when something interesting happened suddenly, but I was not recording.
